name: blacksmith-atlas
description: Professional Asset Management System for VFX Studios - Dockerized for cross-platform deployment
author: Blacksmith VFX

scripts.docker:dev: docker compose up -d && echo 'ðŸš€ Blacksmith Atlas started with Docker!' && echo 'Frontend: http://localhost:3011' && echo 'Backend: http://localhost:8000' && echo 'API Docs: http://localhost:8000/docs'
scripts.docker:cleanup: docker compose down --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.dev:legacy: npm run kill-atlas && npm run setup-database && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.cleanup: npm run kill-atlas-precise && echo 'Atlas processes cleaned up precisely'
